document_data.name: Order's Demand
document_data.mainbody: '''''Order's demand''''' was a ''channel divinity'' power granted to [[cleric]]s who chose the [[Order domain]].
document_data.Effects: Order domain clerics could channel divinity by displaying their holy symbol. All creatures of the cleric's choosing (as long as they could be seen and heard within {{SI|30|ft}}) would become charmed, should they be unable to resist. The intimidated creature could be forced to drop whatever they were holding.
